projects.name: Pronouns
projects.description: A Paper plugin allowing players to set and display their pronouns directly in chat with stunning gradient effects, PlaceholderAPI integration, and comprehensive customization options.

projects.name: PlaceholderNametags
projects.description: A Paper plugin enabling PlaceholderAPI placeholders in nametag suffixes and prefixes. Works very well alongside my pronouns plugin.

projects.name: Quill
projects.description: Create community-run events without bugging your admins. Event-driven scripting within isolated, permission-controlled scopes.

projects.name: CurlyScript
projects.description: I can't come up with a reasonable explanation as to why I made it. Just know I did, and it was worth it.

projects.name: Project Neon
projects.description: A  fully modular, relay-based multiplayer protocol that is completely game-agnostic.
